I can't get the subtitles to display during the Na'vi scenes. Please advise. I am using Windows Media Player and I also Have Divx. It wont even load in the Divx. PLEASE ADVISE!!

I was so impressed - I play these on a divx plaayer that i love becuase it seems to play everything i toss at it. i mean sometimes i think it will play dreams right outta my head.

  This plays beautifully all the way up  to 1:02:04  Then its shuts the hell off, i tried everything i could think of, it does not skip - it just quits - i cant even fast forward it past this part becuase as soon as it gets past it and I turn it back on at point after that - Boom Shuts off again, it's like the format changed is what I am thinking. 
   makes no sense to me why this happened. really sucks though because I have waited so long to see this, I was sick when my Family went and I didnt want to go by myslef - Now i am half a movie richer. LOL anyone know why this is ? anyone know how to fix it? anyone know why the hell it's this way? 

  Thanks.

I ran this on My System and got it to work all the way through.

  I still am not sure of the reason why it it will only play to 1:02:04  On a Divx - If Some one could give me even a clue I surely would appreciate it.

  Awesome Movie - Many Thanks.  
 I am Thinking there will be more of these if not more than one at least a sequal eh?
